New Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera 12.2 MP 18-55mm Lens Black Kit
Price: 399.00
Condition: NEW
  • 12.2MP APS-C CMOS Sensor
  • 18-55 EF-S Lens Included
  • SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot
  • DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor
  • 2.7" Clear View LCD
  • 720p HD Movie Mode
  • 100-6400 ISO
  • Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses
  • 63 Zone Dual-Layer System / 9 Point AF
  • 3 fps Continuous Shooting

  • Camera Type Digital, AF/AE single-lens reflex,
camera with built-in flash 
    • 

  • Resolution Effective 12.2MP Total: 12.6MP 
    • 

  • Sensor 22.0 x 14.7 mm APS-C 
    • 

  • File Formats JPEG, RAW, RAW+JPEG 
    • 

  • File Size 12.2MP - large 6.3MP -
medium 3.4MP - size 
    • 

  • Color Spaces sRGB, Adobe RGB 
    • 

  • Movie Modes 1280 x 720/30p/25p 
    • 

  • Lens EF-S 18-55mm lens Compatible
with Canon EF lenses, including EF-S lenses 
    • 

  • Lens Mount Canon EF mount 
    • 

  • Focus Type Auto and manual focus 
    • 

  • Sensitivity 100-6400 
    • 

  • Metering Evaluating Partial
Center-weighted 
    • 

  • Exposure Modes Program AE
(Shiftable), Shutter-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, Manual exposure,
Automatic depth-of-field, Scene Intelligent Auto, Flash Off, Creative Auto,
Programmed Image Control modes, E-TTL II autoflash program AE 
    • 

  • White Balance Auto white balance
with the image sensor 
    • 

  • Burst Capability JPEG: Max
approximately 3.0fps RAW: Max approximately 2.0fps RAW+JPEG: Approximately
0.8fps 
    • 

  • Self Timer  2-10 second self timer 
    • 

  • Remote Control Yes optional RS-60E3
    • 

  • Built-in Flash Yes 
    • 

  • External Flash Connection 
    • 

  • Hot shoe Dedicated Flash System 
    • 

  • E-TTL II autoflash 
    • 

  • Max Sync Speed 1/200 
    • 

  • Memory Card Type SD/SDHC/SDXC memory
card 
    • 

  • Recording Formats .MOV 
    • 

  • Video Recording Yes 
    • 

  • Video Resolution 1280 x
1080/30p/24p/25p 1280 x 720/50p/60p 640 x 480/30p/25p 
    • 

  • Video Clip Length Not specified by
manufacturer 
    • 

  • Audio Recording Yes - Linear PCM
Built-in monoaural microphone 
    • 

  • Viewfinder Type Eye-level SLR (with
fixed pentamirror) 
    • 

  • Viewfinder Coverage Vertical/horizontal
approximately 95% (TD) 
    • 

  • Display Vari-angle Clear View LCD
(3:2) 
    • 

  • Operating/Storage Temperature 32 to
104°F / 0 to 40°C 
    • 

  • Battery Type Lithium-ion (LP-E10) 
    • 

  • Power Adapter With the AC Adapter
Kit ACK-E10, AC power is possible 
    • 

  • Weight 17.4 oz / 495g Body only

Please be sure you understand and agree to
these terms before you buy.


    

  • 

    Dig Jungle allows returns of
up to 14 Days after your item has been delivered


    

  • 

    Please note all returns must
be in original packaging and have an RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization)
number issued by Dig Jungle


    

  • 

    To get RMA
number please contact us via eBay messaging service


The following conditions
apply to all returns (Condition
of item when the item is received by Dig Jungle from customer):




       Condition - New


    

  • 

    Unopened and sealed (Sticker is untouched) – Full
refund for the cost of the product (excluding any shipping and
handling charges paid by the customer). 
    



    

  • 

    The customer is responsible
for all return shipping costs and insurance to return item to Digjungle


      Condition - Opened




    

  • 

    OPENED but not used (sticker is removed or
cut open). – Full Refund less 15% (restocking fee) for the cost of
the item


    

  • 

    “Not used” means that all settings are set to original factory
settings with no passwords or customer software installed. 
    



    

  • 

    (Note: a
Windows 7 operating system will startup and show “starting windows for the
first time” if it is new and unused)


      Condition - Opened and used




    

  • 

    Refund varies based on condition of the item
and the time it takes a technician to restore the item to factory
settings. 
    



    

  • 

    Typically the refund is 85% of the cost of product. 
    



      Condition - Defective                         


    

  • 

    
If within 14 days your item is deemed to be
defective then Dig Jungle will issue a full refund for the cost of the
laptop and all shipping paid by the customer


    

  • 

    
The customer is asked to
first contact manufacturer for technical support. (Some items can easily
be fixed over the telephone for free) 


    

  • 

    
If a customer cannot resolve issue
with manufacturer representative then please contact Dig Jungle via eBay messages
within 14 days of receipt 
    



    

  • 

    After 14 days has elapsed the customer must
deal with the manufacturer for all future issues

DIG JUNGLE is a leading supplier of computer hardware, software and consumer electronics products for many years.


Our combined industry experience of over 10 years positions us as your strong supplier of consumer electronics goods.


Our company was established with one goal and that is to provide latest technology products at competitive prices to our customers. 


This approach has lead us to constant growth of our strong relationships with major industry manufacturers


We maintain large inventories of all major product lines including laptops, tablets, desktops, printers, LCDs, TVs, cameras, camcorders, gaming equipment and lot more. 


Our inventory management systems, experience logistics staff and sales force ensures quality, accuracy and reliability throughout sales cycle.


We are committed to ensure our customers are satisfied 100% with their purchases.
